SELECT T0.* FROM ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO -- 계약번호 , T1.CNTR_SN , T3.RCGVP_KNM -- 고객명 , T11.SVPD_SAP_CD -- SAP코드 , T1.PDCT_PD_CD -- 품목코드 , T11.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 -- 상품명 , T12.SELL_TP_CD -- 판매유형코드 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T12.SELL_TP_CD, 'ko') AS SELL_TP_CD_NM -- 판매유형코드명 , T1.IST_DT -- 설치일자 , T3.NEW_ADR_ZIP -- 우편번호 , T3.RNADR || ' ' || T3.RDADR AS ADR -- 주소 , T3.CTPV_NM || ' ' || T3.CTCTY_NM || ' ' || T3.EMD_NM AS ADR_EMD -- 읍면동 , CASE WHEN ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(1),0) CNT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ z1 WHERE z1.ASN_OJ_YM <= #{manageYm} AND z1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND z1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN ) = 0 ) THEN '01' --'신규' WHEN ( T4.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '00' ) THEN '02' --'작업대기' WHEN ( T4.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' ) THEN '03' --'작업완료' ELSE '00' -- '예정' END AS RCGVP_DIV -- 고객구분 , DECODE(T6.DTA_DL_YN, 'N', '고정', '') AS FIX -- 고정 , SUBSTR(T5.VST_DUEDT,1,6) AS VST_DUEDT -- 차기방문월 , T9.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD AS MNG_STD_DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD -- 관리기준(관리계정) - 지역단 , T9.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD AS MNG_STD_DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD -- 관리기준(관리계정) - 지점 , T7.PRTNR_KNM AS MNG_STD_PRTNR_KNM -- 관리기준(관리계정) - 매니저 , T1.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD AS MNG_STD_MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD -- 관리기준(관리계정) - 관리기준급지 , TT7.FNL_CLTN_DT AS MNG_STD_FNL_CLTN_DT -- 관리기준(관리계정) 최종해약일자 (추가) , T10.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD AS CUR_MNTH_ALCTN_DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD -- 당월배정 - 지역단 , T10.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD AS CUR_MNTH_ALCTN_DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD -- 당월배정 - 지점 , T8.PRTNR_KNM AS CUR_MNTH_ALCTN_PRTNR_KNM -- 당월배정 - 매니저 , T8.OG_ID AS BFCH_ICHR_BRCH_OG_ID , T8.OG_TP_CD AS BFCH_ICHR_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , T8.PRTNR_NO AS BFCH_ICHR_PRTNR_NO , T4.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD AS CUR_MNTH_ALCTN_MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD -- 당월배정 - 관리기준급지 , TT8.FNL_CLTN_DT AS CUR_FNL_CLTN_DT -- 당월배정 최종해약일자 (추가) , T4.CST_SV_ASN_NO , T4.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T1.DTL_CNTR_NO , T1.DTL_CNTR_SN , T2.RCGVP_KNM , T4.CTPV_NM , T4.CTCTY_NM , T4.EMD_NM , T3.NEW_ADR_ZIP , T3.RNADR , T3.RDADR FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T1 , TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T2 , TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T3 , TB_GBCO_RNADR_BAS T4 WHERE T1.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T1.VL_STRT_DTM AND T1.VL_END_DTM AND T1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND T2.ADR_ID = T3.ADR_ID AND T4.STRU_MNGT_NO(+) = T3.STRU_MNGT_NO AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T4.DTA_DL_YN(+) = 'N' ) T3 ON T3.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT z2.* FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ z2 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ z3 ON z2.CST_SV_ASN_NO = z3.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND z3.VST_DV_CD != '20' AND z2.ASN_OJ_YM = #{manageYm} ) T4 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , MIN(T1.VST_DUEDT) AS VST_DUEDT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.VST_DUEDT,1,6) > #{manageYm} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY T1.CNTR_NO, T1.CNTR_SN ) T5 ON T5.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T01.CNTR_NO , T01.CNTR_SN , T01.DTA_DL_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_FXN_PRTNR_IZ T01 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(T02.CH_SN) AS CH_SN , T02.CNTR_NO , T02.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_FXN_PRTNR_IZ T02 GROUP BY T02.CNTR_NO, T02.CNTR_SN ) T02 ON T02.CNTR_NO = T01.CNTR_NO AND T02.CNTR_SN = T01.CNTR_SN AND T01.CH_SN = T02.CH_SN ) T6 ON T6.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T6.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T7 -- 해약자 나오도록 변경 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL TT7 ON T7.OG_TP_CD = TT7.OG_TP_CD AND T7.PRTNR_NO = TT7.PRTNR_NO ON T7.OG_TP_CD = T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND T7.PRTNR_NO = T1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO AND T7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T9 ON T9.BASE_YM = #{manageYm} AND T9.OG_ID = T7.OG_ID AND T9.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T8 -- 해약자 나오도록 변경 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL TT8 ON T8.OG_TP_CD = TT8.OG_TP_CD AND T8.PRTNR_NO = TT8.PRTNR_NO ON T8.OG_TP_CD = T4.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND T8.PRTNR_NO = T4.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND T8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T10 ON T10.BASE_YM = #{manageYm} AND T10.OG_ID = T8.OG_ID AND T10.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN () T11 ON T11.SVPD_PD_CD = T1.PDCT_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T12 ON T12.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T12.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('101','201', '202', '203') AND T1.IST_DT IS NOT NULL
AND ( T9.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD = #{localGroupOgCd} OR T10.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD = #{localGroupOgCd} OR (T9.OG_TP_CD = 'HR1' AND T1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = (SELECT TT1.PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_SPPT_OG_IZ TT1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ TT2 ON TT2.OG_ID = TT1.OG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TT1.BZNS_SPPT_RSB_DV_CD = 'W0206' -- 업무담당자 코드 AND TT1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' -- M조직 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TT1.MNGT_STRT_DT AND TT1.MNGT_END_DT AND TT2.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND TT2.OG_CD = #{localGroupOgCd} AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ) OR (T10.OG_TP_CD = 'HR1' AND T8.PRTNR_NO = (SELECT TT1.PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_SPPT_OG_IZ TT1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ TT2 ON TT2.OG_ID = TT1.OG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TT1.BZNS_SPPT_RSB_DV_CD = 'W0206' -- 업무담당자 코드 AND TT1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' -- M조직 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TT1.MNGT_STRT_DT AND TT1.MNGT_END_DT AND TT2.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND TT2.OG_CD = #{localGroupOgCd} AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ) )
AND T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD IN ('HR1','W02') AND T11.SVPD_ITEM_GR NOT IN ('5','6','7','8','10','11','12','13','14','15','16','91','95','97','98')
AND T3.NEW_ADR_ZIP >= #{addressZipFrom}
AND T3.NEW_ADR_ZIP <= #{addressZipTo}
AND ( T9.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD = #{branchOfficeCd} OR T10.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD = #{branchOfficeCd} )
AND ( T1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = #{partnerNo} OR T4.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{partnerNo} )
AND (T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = 'HR1' OR T4.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = 'HR1')
AND (T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD != 'HR1' AND T4.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD != 'HR1')
ORDER BY T1.CNTR_NO ASC, T1.CNTR_SN ASC ) T0 WHERE 1=1
AND T0.RCGVP_DIV = #{rcgvpDiv}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID -- 총괄단 , DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID -- 지역단 , DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID -- 지점 FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND OG_ID = #{ogId} AND OG_TP_CD = 'W02' -- M조직 AND BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') UNION SELECT DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID -- 총괄단 , DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID -- 지역단 , DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID -- 지점 FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND OG_TP_CD = 'W02' -- M조직 AND BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND OG_ID IN (SELECT TT1.OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_SPPT_OG_IZ TT1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ TT2 ON TT2.OG_ID = TT1.OG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TT1.BZNS_SPPT_RSB_DV_CD = 'W0206' -- 업무담당자 코드 AND TT1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' -- M조직 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TT1.MNGT_STRT_DT AND TT1.MNGT_END_DT AND TT2.OG_ID = TT2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID -- 지역단만 가져옴 AND TT2.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND TT1.PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
